quote_last: . As he had expected, and as had happened every night since Curry had installed the private wire in his Madison Avenue residence, the operator on the up-town end of the line switched off.
title: The Wire Tappers
author: Arthur Stringer

quote_first: “The terrorists,” he began, “crossed the border at
quote_last: last night. Four passports were presented to the immigration officer for stamping. Three were of Swedish origin, and one was from Iraq.”
title: Honour Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer
